title: Heavy Duty Attitude
description: Iain had written a book about The Brethren MC and how powerful they could be.He knew it was a dangerous thing to have done, whether they liked it or not, and one that had taken him part way into their world.And now it was his turn.Now a new President, with big boots to fill, was going to make him an offer he was going to find difficult to refuse, and once in the outlaw bikerâ€™s world, would he ever be able to get out again?And as an outsider on the inside, with serious trouble looming, who, if anyone, can he trust?
author: Iain Parke
